text:
Confessing at school...
Does that really happen?

I-I've never actually
seen it happen...

Oh, you mean because
I went to middle school for girls~

Like, on the rooftop when no one's around...
Or in the courtyard... Behind the gym...?

I see~! Then, I'll bring bread with me
when I go peeking at that kind of thing~.

Anpan and milk, right?
It's like staking out!
